Simple sequence repeats were searched on the assembled unigenes from the transcriptome data using MISA script
7 . The searching standard parameters were set so that mono-, di-, tri-, tetra-, penta-, and hexa-nucleotides were repeated at least 10, 6, 5, 5, 5, and 5 times, respectively. The SSR primers were designed using Primer3 software
8 with the following parameters ( Ma S. et al., 2019): (1) primer length 18–27 bp; (2) PCR product size 100–300 bp; (3) GC content 40–60%; and (4) annealing temperature 55–65°C.
